attributes.action: Ban the use of memory sticks by all Government & Civil Service departments and their contractors ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will help reduce the risk of Data Loss, Also all Goverment\Civil Service computers\Laptops\Notepads should have any floppy\optical\CD\DVD etc drives removed. There should be NO justification for Any of these devices.
The government needs to get a grip on data loss, at the moment they dont have a clue what is going on!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
